properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 050200Z TO 120159Z JAN BY
   M/V RAMFORM VIKING TOWING TEN 8100 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   23-27.42S 039-29.52W, 22-43.97S 040-01.52W,
   23-12.60S 040-47.50W, 23-57.18S 040-15.37W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 120259Z JAN 13.
